nodes.text: Craig Titley was the writer of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars episode "Blue Shadow Virus".
Titley's feature film credits include Scooby-Doo (2002), Cheaper By the Dozen (2003), Cheaper By the Dozen 2 (2005) and the adaptation of Percy Jackson and the Lightning Thief (2010).

Craig Titley is a graduate of the USC School of Cinematic Art's Peter Stark Producing Program and is currently getting his Phd in Mythological Studies from Pacifica Graduate School, home of the Joseph Campbell library and archives.
